COMMENTS.MossyMax: for all the pve scaling numbers and some base damage values
archetypeNotes: because of how infrequently some values vary they have had been made reliant upon defaualts
isExplosive is defaulted to false, if true dmg*critmult is impact. so dmg of 100 and crit mult of 0.3 would be 30 impact
oneAmmoBurst is defaulted to false, if the gun shoots multiple bullets in a "burst" but only uses one ammo per burst set this to true
isCharge is defaulted to false, if the gun has a charge time set this to true
